location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Benjamin Jervis, East India Company Resident at Bushere [Bushire], to William Andrew Price, East India Company Agent at Bussorah [Basra]

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: some of the bottom of f. 58v has been torn away, obscuring text.

mods.abstract: The letter gives details of recent purchases of Carmenia [KirmƒÅn] wool, discusses the current state of trade in Bushire, and makes a request for scarlet perpets.
